titleStmt.title: The age & life of man. Here you may see the frailty that's in men, till they have run the years threescore and ten. / Tune of Jane Shore.
titleStmt.author: Fancy, P., fl. 1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Williamson in Canon street and at the Bible on London-Bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
